ValidationRule.description: Il campo Elenco valori Risposta risulta valorizzato per un Tipo Risposta diverso da "Dominio chiuso"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ResponseValueList1__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse1__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList2__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse2__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList3__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse3__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList4__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse4__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList5__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse5__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList6__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse6__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList7__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse7__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList8__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse8__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList9__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse9__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList10__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse10__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList11__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse11__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList12__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse12__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList13__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse13__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList14__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse14__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList15__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse15__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList16__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse16__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList17__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse17__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList18__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse18__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList19__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse19__c, "Dominio chiuso"))), AND(ResponseValueList20__c <> "", NOT(ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse20__c, "Dominio chiuso"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: L'elenco valori deve essere valorizzato solo per risposte di Tipo "Dominio Chiuso"
